channel.title: Add pk points
channel.description: I am 99.99% sure i have all the coding right but when i add the points they only last until i log out once i log out i go back to the character files and the = sign has gone and when i next login i have no points? :S

item.title: Add pk points
item.dc:creator: @arcuza arcuza
item.description:
@arcuza wrote:

zyle1992:

Fix the way the data is saved and loaded. It’s probably just a number error (getting a substring between the wrong indices).

aha sounds confusing i dunno wat to do

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Fix the way the data is saved and loaded. It’s probably just a number error (getting a substring between the wrong indices).

item.title: Add pk points
item.dc:creator: @arcuza arcuza
item.description:
@arcuza wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:429788”][quote author=arcuza link=topic=532466.msg3891837#msg3891837 date=1326933250]
I am 99.99% sure i have all the coding right but when i add the points they only last until i log out once i log out i go back to the character files and the = sign has gone and when i next login i have no points? :S
[/quote]

It sounds like the saving/loading of the points is the problem.[/quote] what can i do?
